Package org.redpin.android.net

Interface Summary
DownloadImageTask.DownloadImageTaskCallback Callback Interface for DownloadImageTask
PerformRequestTaskCallback Callback Interface for PerformRequestTask
UploadImageTask.UploadImageTaskCallback Callback Interface for UploadImageTask
 

Class Summary
ConnectionHandler The ConnectionHandler handles a connection to the redpin server.
DownloadImageTask AsyncTask for downloading images in the background and saving them locally if not yet cached.
InternetConnectionManager The InternetConnectionManager provides information about the connectivity to the Redpin server.
PerformRequestTask PerformRequestTask is a specialized AsyncTask to perform an server request on the background
Request<D> Class representing an server request
RequestHandler The RequestHandler is responsible for serializing and deserializing the server request
Response<D> Class representing a response from the server.
SynchronizationManager SynchronizationManager synchronizes the local database with the server
UploadImageTask AsyncTask for uploading images in the background
 

Enum Summary
Request.RequestType Supported redpin request types
Response.Status Different status the server reports back to the client
